document.full_text: with a plan to sell $8.75 billion of bonds to pay bills stalled in the illinois general assembly, governor pat quinn is pursuing a smaller, short-term borrowing for medicaid-related debts.
document.title: illinois governor eyes short-term medicaid borrowing
lines_and_colors: with a plan to sell $8.75 billion of bonds to pay bills stalled in the illinois general assembly, governor pat quinn is pursuing a smaller, short-term borrowing for medicaid-related debts.
